lead_paragraph: Seven New England Patriots fans sued the National Football League on Tuesday, asking a judge to reverse a decision by the league to strip the team of a first-round pick in this month's draft over allegations of underinflated footballs.

headline.print_headline: Patriots Fans Sue NFL Over Lost 'Deflategate' Draft Picks
headline.main: Patriots Fans Sue NFL Over Lost 'Deflategate' Draft Picks

snippet: Seven New England Patriots fans sued the National Football League on Tuesday, asking a judge to reverse a decision by the league to strip the team of a first-round pick in this month's draft over allegations of underinflated footballs....
